Class HistoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • inventorymanagement.controller.HistoryController

  • @RestController
public class HistoryController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class HistoryController is a controller that handle requests for issuing and returning of items.

      • create

        @RequestMapping(value="/history",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
 @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
public inventorymanagement.model.HistoryModel create(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                   inventorymanagement.model.IncomingHistoryModel historyModel,
                                                                                                                                                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
                                                                                                                                                            throws inti.ws.spring.exception.client.UnauthorizedException,
                                                                                                                                                                   inti.ws.spring.exception.client.BadRequestException,
                                                                                                                                                                   inti.ws.spring.exception.client.NotFoundException
        Controller method to issue an item to a user
        Parameters:
        historyModel - IncomingHistoryModel contains product tag, user id and product id required for issuing item to user
        session - HttpSession for validating if user is admin or not
        Returns:
        HistoryModel
        Throws:
        inti.ws.spring.exception.client.UnauthorizedException - Thrown when user is not logged in or not an admin
        inti.ws.spring.exception.client.BadRequestException - Thrown when any of the field is empty
        inti.ws.spring.exception.client.NotFoundException - Thrown when no product or item with id or tag is found

        Controller method to take item returns from a user
        Parameters:
        id - Integer Issue ticket number for the issued item
        historyModel - IncomingReturnModel contains product tag id of the item being returned
        session - HttpSession for validating if user is admin or not
        Returns:
        HistoryModel
        Throws:
        inti.ws.spring.exception.client.NotFoundException - Thrown when no product or item with id or tag is found
